name: Step Out (Dul2Work)
description: Plan your strategy beforehand in order not to surpass the given amount of moves. Every turn counts...  If,by any means, you surpass this limit or come into contact with one of the enemies; you will then lose 1 life and restart the level from the very beginning.  Beware, you have 3 lifes. If, at some point, you have no more lifes to spare, expect a cold future full of solitude apart from having to start all over again of course.  GOOD LUCK!
